body_html:
I had originally listed my problem in #5214

The PRId64 problem has gone. However I am getting a new error,
CMake Error at /home/uray/anaconda2/share/cmake-3.9/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:137 (message): Could NOT find ibverbs (missing: IBVERBS_INCLUDE_DIRS IBVERBS_LIBRARIES)

I am unable to find any issue related to this. Any help will be appreciated. Thanks

body:
I had originally listed my problem in #5214 

The PRId64 problem has gone. However I am getting a new error,
`CMake Error at /home/uray/anaconda2/share/cmake-3.9/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:137 (message):
  Could NOT find ibverbs (missing: IBVERBS_INCLUDE_DIRS IBVERBS_LIBRARIES)`

I am unable to find any issue related to this. Any help will be appreciated. Thanks
